page.title: Transporter
page.text: This machines allows the user to transport himself instantly from one location to another.

To accomplish that the $itemName requires FE energy based on the distance. It stores the quantum information of each atom and transfers it to a desired location. Every entity directly above the $itemName will be affected by the transportation. This means that multiple subjects can teleport at the same time. The $itemName must also be configured with the destination inates.

page.title: Destination
page.text: The destination consists of 3 values. The X, Y and Z inates of the world point. Each inate also shows the relative displacement/distance compared to the transporter itself. Each location stored in the transporter can be edited and renamed. Then only the selected location is used as a destination.
You can also use a [item name=transport_flash_drive] to quickly import destination inates.

page.title: Upgrades
page.text: By default the $itemName has quite a small range. [item name=upgrade meta=4 guide=upgrades page=4] can be used to boots the range of the $itemName. Each range upgrades stacks up and can add up to quite a large radius.
It must be noted that they also increase the power usage of the $itemName.
You can also use the [item name=upgrade meta=1 guide=upgrades page=1] and [item name=upgrade meta=2 guide=upgrades page=2] as well as the [item name=upgrade guide=upgrades page=5 meta=5].
